save_category_payments.title: Activation of payment methods by category

errors.display_form: An error occurred while building category payments form.

header: Activate your payment methods according to the category of products added to the basket.
Example: You can activate TRD only for categories containing only eligible food products.
footer: If you do not check any box in a column, this means that all categories are eligible for this method of payment.
A payment button can only be used for a given order if at least one product of the order is eligible.
For an order also containing non-eligible products, a supplement will be automatically requested in blue card.

save_shipping_payments.title: Management of delivery costs by means of payment

errors.display_form: An error occurred while building shipping payments form.

header: If shipping costs should not be paid with certain payment types, check the corresponding boxes.
For example, check the TRD box to ensure that shipping costs are not paid using this payment type.
footer: By default, the delivery costs are eligible for all means of payment.
Check the boxes above is therefore to exclude them from a means of payment.
If shipping costs are excluded from a payment type, a credit card payment will be required.
